sources.title: 1945 Der Stumme Gast
sources.description: Film aus dem deutschen dritten Reich von 1945 Der stumme Gast.. U.a mit Rene Deltgen

metadata.Plot: Mathias Radschek, host of the Birnbaum inn, loves his young wife and can't refuse her anything she wants. Since Lisa's wish list is extremely extensive, Mathias has to earn a lot more than he does. To make that extra income he is trading smuggled furs. But Mathias has another problem, the wine merchant Oskar Kampmann who is very charmed by Lisa.
metadata.Writer: Harald Braun, Theodor Fontane, Kurt Heynicke
metadata.Actors: René Deltgen, Gisela Uhlen, Rudolf Fernau
